channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Electrocution Danger - bare wires exposed at car charging terminal, 19th June
item.description:

item.title: Bins causing an obstruction, 19th June
item.description:
Bins are left outside 5, 7 and 9 park Grove, Bexleyheath 365 days of the year and block the pavement to wheelchair users and cause an obstruction / tripping hazard to blind and visually impaired pedestrians

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Grove, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tulsemere Road SE27 outside house number 71, 19th June
item.description:
Tulsemere Road SE27 outside house number 71 (or dia opposite Towton Rd junction) road hole. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture noting the bed of the road is thin tarmac and then into ‘ballast’ so hole will open up quickly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 68, Tulsemere Road, Tulse Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox, 19th June
item.description:
There was a dead fox, with the heat it smelled so we have put it in six bin bags and put it in our black bin, but the smell is incredible even after one day. Next black bin collection is in two weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 79, Beaconsfield Road, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime bike chaos, 19th June

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salcombe Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath consistently blocked, 19th June
item.description:
The footpath on Pellerin Road, especially all the bikes chained to the lamppost outside 66 and the bins permanently outside 62, is constantly blocked and Hackney Council seem to be doing nothing about it what so ever. Impassible for wheelchairs & prams.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pellerin Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
